              # é…ç½®gitä»£ç†

              ~/.zshrc ä¸­æ–°å¢é…ç½®, éœ€è¦å¼€å¯æ—¶è¿è¡Œï¼šproxy_git_on

              # å¼€å¯ä»£ç†
function proxy_git_on() {
    # éœ€è¦å…ˆåˆ é™¤ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å¤šæ¬¡æŠ¥é”™
    git config --global --unset http.proxy
    git config --global --unset https.proxy

    git config --global http.proxy http://127.0.0.1:7890
    git config --global https.proxy http://127.0.0.1:7890
    echo -e "å·²å¼€å¯gitä»£ç†"
}

function proxy_git_off(){
    git config --global --unset http.proxy
    git config --global --unset https.proxy
    echo -e "å·²å…³é—­gitä»£ç†"
}

              # é…ç½®npmä»£ç†

              ~/.zshrc ä¸­æ–°å¢é…ç½®, éœ€è¦å¼€å¯æ—¶è¿è¡Œï¼šproxy_npm_on

              # å¼€å¯ä»£ç†
function proxy_npm_on() {
    # ä¸éœ€è¦å…ˆåˆ é™¤ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å¤šæ¬¡æ²¡å½±å“
    npm config set proxy http://127.0.0.1:7890
    npm config set https-proxy http://127.0.0.1:7890
    echo -e "å·²å¼€å¯npmä»£ç†"
}

function proxy_npm_off(){
    npm config delete proxy
    npm config delete https-proxy
    echo -e "å·²å…³é—­npmä»£ç†"
}

              # é…ç½®ç»ˆç«¯ä»£ç†

              ~/.zshrc ä¸­æ–°å¢é…ç½®, éœ€è¦å¼€å¯æ—¶è¿è¡Œï¼šproxy_on

              # è¯¥è®¾ç½®ä»…å¯¹å½“å‰ç»ˆç«¯çª—å£ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œå…³é—­çª—å£ï¼Œä¸‹æ¬¡éœ€è¦å†è®¾ç½®ä¸€æ¬¡ proxy_on [éœ€è¦å¼€å¯å…¨å±€æ¨¡å¼]
function proxy_on() {
    export no_proxy="localhost,127.0.0.1,localaddress,localdomain.com"
    export http_proxy="http://127.0.0.1:7890"
    export https_proxy=$http_proxy
    export ftp_proxy=$http_proxy
    export rsync_proxy=$http_proxy
    export HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy
    export HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy
    export FTP_PROXY=$http_proxy
    export RSYNC_PROXY=$http_proxy
    echo -e "å·²å¼€å¯ç»ˆç«¯ä»£ç†"
}

function proxy_off(){
    unset http_proxy
    unset https_proxy
    unset ftp_proxy
    unset rsync_proxy
    echo -e "å·²å…³é—­ç»ˆç«¯ä»£ç†"
}
